sqlMap.insert:
SELECT PROJECT_SEQ.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PROJECT ( PROJECT_NO, MEM_ID, PROJECT_CLIENTINFORMATION, PROJECT_CLIENTINTRODUCE, PROJECT_PROCESSSTATUS, PROJECT_PROCESSCATEGORY, PROJECT_TITLE, PROJECT_REGISTDATE ) VALUES ( #project_no#, #mem_id#, #project_clientinformation#, #project_clientintroduce#, #project_processstatus#, #project_processcategory#, #project_title#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_READYSTATUS = #project_readystatus#, PROJECT_REFERENCE = #project_reference# WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no#
UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_CURRENTSTATUS = #project_currentstatus#, PROJECT_TECHNOLOGIES = #project_technologies# WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no#

UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_BUDGET = #project_budget#, PROJECT_STARTDATE = TO_DATE(#project_startdate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), PROJECT_DURATION = #project_duration#, PROJECT_ENDDATE = TO_DATE(#project_startdate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + #project_duration# WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no#

UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_PREMEETING = #project_premeeting#, PROJECT_PROCEEDINGMEETING = #project_proceedingmeeting#, PROJECT_MEETINGCYCLE = #project_meetingcycle#, PROJECT_CLIENTLOCATION = #project_clientlocation# WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no#

UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_APPLICATIONDEADLINE = TO_DATE(#project_applicationdeadline#, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), PROJECT_SUPPORTSTATUS = #project_supportstatus#, PROJECT_ESSENTIALREQUIREMENTS = #project_essentialrequirements# WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no#

UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_MANPOWER = #project_manpower#, PROJECT_MANAGEMENTEXPERIENCE = #project_managementexperience#, PROJECT_FUTUREPLANS = #project_futureplans#, PROJECT_PRIORITY = #project_priority#, PROJECT_INPUTSTATUS = 'Y' WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no#
